text: aur hamane un (yahoodiyon) par us (tauraat) mein likh diya ki praan ke badale praan, aankh ke badale aankh, naak ke badale naak, kaan ke badale kaan aur daant ke badale daant[1] hain tatha sabhee aaghaaton mein baraabaree ka badala hai. phir jo koee badala lene ko daan (kshama) kar de, to vah usake lie (usake paapon ka) praayashchit ho jaayega tatha jo allaah kee utaaree (pustak ke) anusaar nirnay na karen, vahee atyaachaaree hain
